ERICSSON CLOUD | Alpha Developer Portal

Welcome, here you will find the alpha releases of Ericsson Cloud API’s. This is a growing, evolving list, based on user’s feedback and real world needs…

Today, software is the primary way you engage customers. Your business is your software, and every company is now in the data business. If you are a global enterprise you want to move to cloud computing to deliver the speed and immediacy that your customers demand, while realizing the new economics of cloud computing.

But, to date, the promise of cloud technologies has fallen short for the world’s most demanding enterprises.


  • Only 17% operate a hybrid cloud
  • Only 16% have ERP workloads on cloud
  • Only 27% have digital commercial apps on cloud

Ericsson - Realizing the potential of cloud



If you are an enterprise executive working in a highly demanding, performance driven industry, you are continuously being forced to choose between speed and risk. You either leverage cloud to deliver software at a faster pace and expose the company to higher levels of risk or, mitigate risk by burdening IT with policies that slow down development efforts in the cloud.

Imagine an industrial grade cloud…


  • You can trust
  • With known performance
  • With known economics
  • Where needs of the business drive behavior
  • That’s always available
  • That doesn’t break the law

And then we realize a cloud strategy is not required, rather we need a digital industrialization strategy. You need one IT infrastructure that can marry legacy with modern, using one automation and governance approach. You need a trusted global partner that can provide


  • Advanced cloud technology
  • People and IT transformation on a global scale
  • Innovative commercials based on your terms and needs


You need a trusted global partner


  • With over 100 years of managing global, predictable, secure infrastructure
  • That understands governance in 180+ countries
  • That are experts at managing multiple generations of technology


We start with where you are…
